actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Health and Human Services Department, GAO, OMB.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to prepare and transmit to the Congress a special report on the health care needs of native Hawaiians and other native American Pacific Islanders.
short_title: Native Hawaiian and Native American Pacific Islanders Health Care Needs Act of 1983
subjects: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

summary.text: Native Hawaiian and Native American Pacific Islanders Health Care Needs Act of 1983 - Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to prepare a report for Congress within one year on the physical and mental health care needs of native Hawaiians and other native American Pacific Islanders.

titles.title: Native Hawaiian and Native American Pacific Islanders Health Care Needs Act of 1983

A bill to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to prepare and transmit to the Congress a special report on the health care needs of native Hawaiians and other native American Pacific Islanders.
